channel.title: Pkp error
channel.description: My server as pkp and when you kill someone you get 25, it supposed to be only wildy, but if you die by kq, or kbd, or duel arena you gain them too, it said you have (your name the player who died in duel arena or Pvm) you gain 25 pkp can anybody help me fix i got teamviwer.

item.title: Pkp error
